title: So once again you ruin URF by refusing to autoban champs
body: Why?  The mode was fun when you kicked out the top offenders.  Now it's just a stupid game of who picks the broken unbanned champs since there are nowhere near enough bans to deal with the madness.

replies.body: Cause who doesn't love to face {{champion:238}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:17}} in every game. >_>

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KbaokvKE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-23T03:59:17.107+0000)
>
> Cause who doesn't love to face {{champion:238}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:17}} in every game. >_>

{{champion:238}} get qss
{{champion:35}} sweeper
{{champion:37}} all in. If you aren't winning then you've picked wrong champ in this mode.
{{champion:245}} dont see any problem that needs to be dealt with. Stun isn't permanent, damage isn't bursty.
{{champion:81}} I'll give you this one. The poke will hurt and you can't catch him. You'll have to pick something just as broken.
{{champion:17}} sweeper
